abstract: After receiving proposals from a number of interested parties, the New Hope Corporation said it would explore a sale, sending its market value soaring to $5 billion.
snippet: After receiving proposals from a number of interested parties, the New Hope Corporation said it would explore a sale, sending its market value soaring to $5 billion.
lead_paragraph: The New Hope Corporation, an Australian coal miner, officially put itself on the block after receiving proposals from a number of interested parties.

headline.main: Australian Coal Miner Puts Itself Up for Sale
